author: cms-sw
body:
We can do something like
1. Make a temp branch for the clang IB -> https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/tree/IB/CMSSW_11_3_X%2Fclang
2. Change the branch in the config.map
3. Get LLVM 11 in the cmsdist/clang branch
4. Fix the warnings
5. Sync back cmsdist/clang to cmsdist/master 
needs this:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1502
title: LLVM 11 in CLANG IB only
